                                                                           =
                                     : : Sting : :

                       =
                                                                     Sting =
nods and then smiles a bit.
    
                                          =
                                             Sting:  It's a pleasure to mee=
t you all.

                                                               =
          He extends his arm and hand out to Diesel, for a handshake.
  ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:58 PM
  Subject: Re: Secret Messages=



  : : Diesel : :

  Diesel transforms to his robot mode.

  Diesel: I am=
 Diesel.

  He motions to the others.

  Diesel: This is Arrow and Deemos.
=
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 11:55 PM
    Subject: Re: =
Secret Messages


                                                         =
                                                    : : Sting : :

        =
                                                                           =
    He walks closer, and gets ready to speak.

                            =
                                                             Sting:  Hi.  I=
t's Sting.  Who are you?
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Ro=
boRick007 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, August 13=
, 2002 10:53 PM
      Subject: Re: Secret Messages


      : : Diesel : :

=
      The dark tanker sees as this mysterious bot, Sting, drops down infron=
t of their convoy. He activates his breaks screeching to a stop.

      Die=
sel: Who are you, and what do you want?
        ----- Original Message ----=
- 
        From: LurkerAbyss 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        S=
ent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:42 PM
        Subject: Re: Secret Messages=



                                                   : : Sting : :

      =
                      A mysterious, dark bot just happens to be decending f=
rom the sky, up ahead, and lands right in the path of Diesel, Arrow and Dee=
mos.  He waits to see if they will see him and stop...
          ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
          From: RoboRick007 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
          Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 10:31 PM
          Sub=
ject: Re: Secret Messages


          : : Diesel : :

          Diesel pull=
s out, following the others towards their destination.
            ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
            From: Hollywood Narrator 
            To:=
 nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Tuesday, August 13, 2002 9:47 PM=

            Subject: Re: Secret Messages


            Arrow transforms in=
to a motorcycle. He whips around on a dime and speeds towards the destinati=
on. Deems transforms into a mechanical vulture and flies along behind...

 =
             ----- Original Message -----
              From: RoboRick007
 =
             To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
              Sent: Tuesday, August=
 13, 2002 2:29 PM
              Subject: Re: Secret Messages


            =
  : : Diesel : :

              He smiled at his friends excitment.

      =
        Diesel: Alright lets go get our ship. And maybe, just maybe, we get=
 to kill some bots doing it!

              Diesel transformes to his fuel =
truck mode.

              Diesel: Roll out!

              He drives out a=
nd pulls to the side waiting for Arrow to lead the way.
